name: cleaning_getProgress
description: This function is used to check the cleaning progress of a robot vacuum cleaner.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device whose cleaning progress needs to be checked. ### CHECK ###

parameters.name: groupAction
parameters.description: A group action associated with the device.
